tool.name: OGS: ExtractBoundary
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ExtractBoundary'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh_input_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; ExtractBoundary --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file.element_identifier' $ascii_output --mesh-output-file output_1.vtu

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtu). the file containing the input mesh

param.name: ascii_output
param.label: ascii output
param.help: If the switch is set use ascii instead of binary format for data in the vtu output.

tool.help: This tool runs the **ExtractBoundary** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
